title.narrative: QUALITY INCLUSIVE EDUCATION (3-17)

description.narrative: By 2020, the education system has increased capacity to provide quality inclusive education for vulnerable children 3-17 years old (including refugee children)., which contributes to Early Learning, Education â€“ General, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equitable Access To Quality Education (Covid), Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participationBy 2020, the education, child and social protection and health systems, NGOs, communities and families provide vulnerable children with increasingly inclusive opportunities to realize their rights to protection, education, development and participation.

sector.narrative: Education Management Information System (EMIS) (excluding learning assessment systems)

System strengthening - inclusive education for children with disabilities
System strengthening - mother tongue / multilingual education

System strengthening - teacher development, management, and support

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020, the education system has increased capacity to provide quality inclusive education for vulnerable children 3-17 years old(including refugee children).

description.narrative: The capacity of the education system to provide quality inclusive education for all children, especially the most vulnerable, is strengthened with support to education policy and practice, education personnel professional development and learning assessment systems, advocacy, awareness and knowledge generation and inclusive early childhood education for children with disabilities. | Status:Met | As-of Date:17/01/2021

of educational personnel trained (Syrian/Turkish; Female/Male) in relation to quality inclusive education(43518), Text
In-service teacher training includes modules on inclusive education in line with international good practices(61240), Text

baseline.value: In-service teacher training modules only implicitly include elements on inclusive education

target.value: 2020:By 2020, in-service teacher training includes modules on inclusive education in line with international good practice

actual.value: 2020:Inclusive Education Teacher Training Modules were put in use nationwide and made available online to all teachers.

title.narrative: Education assessment system includes tools & frameworks targeting all vulnerable students in line with international standards (61241), Text

baseline.value: There are assessment frameworks and tools that partially meet the needs of some vulnerable students

target.value: 2020:Education assessment tools and frameworks in line with international standards are disseminated throughout the education system

actual.value: 2020:E-module for the ECE and Primary Education Assessment Framework for CwD was tested in 2020.

title.narrative: Existence of appropriate law/policy explicitly mentioning the rights of children with disabilities to receive an education(61242), Text

baseline.value: There is a law/policy establishing the right of all children to attend school, which does not explicitely mention CWDs

target.value: 2020:Legislation for the special education services was revised in 2020 by MoNE with provisions to additional support for children with disabilities.

actual.value: 2020:Legislation for the special education services was officially revised in 2020 by MoNE with provisions to additional support for children with disabilities.
